content: Hard for me to be anything but disappointed. You couldn’t have a worse president than trump. He makes George W Bush look like George Washington by comparison. The fact that anyone still votes GOP is disheartening let alone a majority in that district. I realize it is a red area but still how can you look at Trump/Bannon/Pence and not be afraid to give them any other gop members in the House. I still call it a defeat.
